long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸ“– Create flashcards from Oxford Learner's Dictionary directly via Chrome extension

- Look up any word on any website and see the definition from Oxford Learner's Dictionary directly in current page.
- Save these words as flashcards to be reviewed/ re-learnt later.
- Store your flashcards on cloud with your Google account.
